trends: There have been no other sightings in Malinalco
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsthis was the first time i have ever seen physical unexplainable phenomenon in the sky in my life, although i have some very credible family members and others i know who have had ufo experiences. these were star-like points of light, starting with one, moving in unnatural patterns, absolutely silent in a place and under conditions where one hears "everything". their motion seemed intelligent and playful and the shaman said that he knows them and that they are intelligent life-forms, but hesitated to say much more. i suppose that high-tech fakery would be possible but i know these people and know that they are not involved in anything like that, and furthermore there is a very dense history of these sightings in this region, with a large portion of the population being direct witnesses to these strange phenomenon, which are commonly believed to be witches, and have been seen as long as history goes back around here. [link moved to fi section\cms\tg]
